Interface TokenAuthorizationSource

      • forInstallation

        static @NonNull TokenAuthorizationSource forInstallation​(@NonNull Installation installation)
        Create a token-based authorization source from an installation.

        The installation must be part of a GitHub-App-authorized instance.

        This is equivalent to calling forInstallation(Installation, ScheduledExecutorService) with a brand new single-threaded ScheduledExecutorService.

        Parameters:
        installation - the installation to get access tokens from
        Returns:
        the new authentication source
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • forInstallation

        static @NonNull TokenAuthorizationSource forInstallation​(@NonNull Installation installation,
                                                         @NonNull ScheduledExecutorService refreshExecutor)
        Create a token-based authorization source from an installation.

        The installation must be part of a GitHub-App-authorized instance.

        Parameters:
        installation - the installation to get access tokens from
        refreshExecutor - the executor to schedule refresh tasks on
        Returns:
        the new authentication source
        Since:
        2.0.0
